title: Drawing, "Design for Case Clocks", ca. 1805
medium: Graphite, pen and ink, brush and watercolor on paper
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Center design: case with painted panels of landscapes, the hood surmounted by the figure of Chronos. Clocks to left and right have simple wood cases, the design at right having a pedimented hood and panels with painted tracery.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Case Clocks", ca. 1805.
ca. 1805. Graphite, pen and ink, brush and watercolor on paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1911-28-496.
